Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Kristin M. Davenport
Reviews.Content: I bought these for my 13, and 12 year olds. I have only taken them out of the box to try, but the picture quality is greater than expected and I am pleased with it completely for the amount of money. Great to have in your purse or backpack for on the go!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: KD "KD"
Reviews.Content: My 8 year old daughter received this for Christmas. It's perfect for her: the size, the screen, the color and the ease of use. She absolutely loves it and I love it because she's not asking to use my camera anymore!

Reviews.Title: Polaroid t1455 14 Megapixel Compact Camera - 5 mm-25 mm - Violet
Reviews.Author: lisa
Reviews.Content: Not very satisfied with this camera, Its ok but, not for me. I gave it to my 13 yr old daughter!

Reviews.Title: Failed after one day.
Reviews.Author: Gee
Reviews.Content: After one day of use it wouldn't turn on anymore no matter how much I charged the battery, and no replacment battery was available. I had to return it, but did get a full refund even after returing it after 30 days of it sitting in a box because it was a gift that I had bought early.

ProductInfo.Features: ALWAYS FREE SHIPPING WITHIN THE USA
ProductInfo.Name: Polaroid t1455 14 Megapixel Compact Camera - 5 mm-25 mm - Violet
